issues.health: THE SHAMEFUL NHS RECORD Labour would rather you forget...

images.caption: Image showing people seated in a waiting room, implying a long wait, possibly at a healthcare facility, with the title 'THE SHAMEFUL NHS RECORD' suggesting criticism of the current or previous handling of the National Health Service. The subtitle 'Labour would rather you forget...' implies that the leaflet is from a competing political party highlighting perceived shortcomings of the Labour party in relation to the NHS.
